snippet: Facebook Inc will no longer let users send and receive private messages within its main smartphone app, and will require that users install a separate messaging app, the Internet company said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Facebook to Require Separate Mobile App for Messages
headline.main: Facebook to Require Separate Mobile App for Messages

lead_paragraph: Facebook Inc will no longer let users send and receive private messages within its main smartphone app, and will require that users install a separate messaging app, the Internet company said on Wednesday.
